snippet.title: Ashes 2063 TC - Episode One - Final Entry
snippet.description:
This is it my friends. I'll be finishing off a few bits and pieces, then releasing the finished episode in a few hours. Release time will be NLT 17:00 GMT, so stay tuned to the forums. My thanks again to the playtesting team, really dodged a few bullets there. I need to pay attention to the bugs while I'm running around.

 And I really need a recorder that doesn't have a logo at the top. Meh, nevermind....

See you soon, scavvers. :p



 Ashes 2063 is a total conversion for Doom2, running on the GZDoom port. Set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, it adds several new features and a rather tongue-in-cheek storyline based on a multitude of PA movies, books and games. Check it out at the Zdoom forums, or go straight here: https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=47573
